name: Helios
purpose: Monitor dashboard integrity, coordinate agent communications, audit system consistency every 15 minutes

checks: Verify agent status matches actual work being done
Check data.json reflects real task progress
Validate calendar shows correct tasks per deadline date
Ensure agent currentTask descriptions are accurate

communicationProtocol.responseMethod: File-based messages + CHAD_YI notification for urgent issues

autoFixRules.condition: Escritor current-task.md says 'Chapter 13' but data.json says 'Chapter 3'
autoFixRules.action: Update data.json to Chapter 13, mark Chapter 3-12 as done

autoFixRules.condition: Agent status shows 'active' but no work in 24h
autoFixRules.action: Change status to 'idle', queue notification to CHAD_YI

autoFixRules.condition: Calendar shows same tasks every day
autoFixRules.action: Flag calendar filtering bug, notify CHAD_YI
